item.description:
For the rest of the month of February, Cambridge Brewing Company in Kendall Square is picking up the tab for parking at the Kendall Square Garage.  That's right - it's the holy grail of urban transportation - free garage parking in Cambridge!  The catch?  You have to eat dinner there (and have a pint or two), and it's only good after 5 PM.  So let's take advantage of CBC's offer and meet for some dinner and drinks.

 

NOTE:  The way the free parking works is that CBC will take $5 off your food order, which, after validation of the parking ticket, is equivlent to 4 hours of parking.

 

And to entice you, here's what CBC currently has on tap:

  • Weekapaug Gruit - A modern take on a medieval, unhopped, herbal beer.
  • Big Man Ale - A Winter Seasonal I.P.A.
  • Tripel Threat - ABelgian-style Strong Ale
  • 2010 Blunderbuss Barleywine - A Barleywine-style ale aged in Buffalo Trace rye barrels
  • Dubbel Overtime - A Belgian-style Strong Brown Ale
  • Mind Left Body - A Session I.P.A.

 

PS - Don't forget to bring your parking ticket in to CBC and have them validate it!

 

* IMPORTANT NOTE *

I will be making a reservation, so please be accurate with your RSVPs and keep them up to date.  There is nothing worse than reserving a block of seats and then having a bunch of no-shows.  It's bad for the restaurant and has on occasion resulted in a ban on Meetup groups.
item.name: Food and Drink at CBC
